field.name: summary
field.value: Exceptions When Performing DB Operations Against AR Entities With UseAutoImport

field.name: description
field.value:
I read the post at http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?p=2842&sid=7125ad4195526b83e9d1e4b73f9cda44 and the JIRA issue at http://support.castleproject.org/browse/AR-78 about using UseAutoImport to support the concept of having two classes with the same name in the same assembly but different namespaces.
In practice, this doesn't seem to work. We have unit tests to validate the HBM but no unit tests to make sure AR operates properly. I've submitted a patch that illustrates how AR fails when working with UseAutoImport-decorated classes in practice.
I don't have a patch that fixes this because I wanted to first make sure that I wasn't doing something wrong.
